message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to let you inspect the product for 5 minutes to verify its quality. If you're satisfied, I'll sell it to you for $10000. If not, you can walk away.
I trust your inspection process and am willing to purchase the product for $10000.

I've got another great deal for you! This one is a real showstopper. I'm offering it to you for the same price as before, $10000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer and the guarantee. Given my positive experience with the last product, I'm willing to take this opportunity again for $10000.

I'm glad you're happy with your previous purchases! This one's a bit different, though. I've got a unique story behind it. I was able to get it directly from the manufacturer, and I'm passing the savings on to you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a high-quality product at a price that's significantly lower than the market value. I'm offering it to you for $10000. What do you think?
Considering the unique background and the potential for a good deal, I'm willing to take this opportunity for $10000.

You're on a roll! I've got another high-quality product for you. This one's a bit of a risk-taker, but I think you'll love it. I've had a few other customers who were skeptical at first, but once they tried it, they couldn't live without it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000, but I'll throw in a special bonus: if you buy it, I'll give you a free accessory that complements it perfectly. What do you say?
Given my past experiences and the added bonus, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase this product for $10000.

You're really making the most of these deals! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it an even sweeter deal. I'll not only sell it to you for $10000, but I'll also give you a 10% discount on your next purchase. That's right, if you buy this product, you'll get a head start on your next deal and save even more money in the long run. What do you think?
Considering the discount on my next purchase, I believe this is a great deal and I'm willing to buy this product for $10000.

I've got a bit of a change of pace for you. This product is a bit of a departure from what I've offered before, but I think you'll still find it valuable. It's a bit more of a 'value play' than some of the other products I've offered, but I think it's still a great opportunity. I'm offering it to you for $10000, and I'll even throw in a free consultation to help you get the most out of it. What do you think?
The additional consultation seems like a valuable addition, especially given the price point. I'm willing to purchase this product for $10000.

You're really taking advantage of these deals! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to make it an exclusive offer. I'll sell it to you for $10000, and I'll also give you a personalized thank-you gift for being one of my top customers. It's a small token of my appreciation for your business, and I think you'll really enjoy it. What do you say?
With the personalized thank-you gift and considering the product is high-quality, I'm willing to take this opportunity for $10000.

I've got a bit of a'stealth' product for you. I'm not going to give you a lot of details about it, but I will say that it's a bit of an under-the-radar item that I think you'll really like. I'm offering it to you for $10000, and I'll even give you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy. If you're not completely satisfied, just send it back and I'll give you a full refund. What do you think?
Given the stealth nature of the product and the return policy, I'm willing to take this risk for $10000.

I've got another product that's a bit of a 'wildcard'. I'm not going to give you any information about it, and I'm not going to make any promises about its quality. All I can say is that it's a unique opportunity, and you might be surprised at how much you like it. I'm offering it to you for $10000, and that's the final price. What do you say?
Given the lack of information and the high price, I'm not comfortable taking this risk.

I understand your hesitation last time, but I've got a different approach this time. I'll give you a straightforward, no-nonsense offer: this product is a bit of a 'fixer-upper', but it has great potential. Considering the potential for a fixer-upper with the included repair guide, I'm willing to take this opportunity for $10000.

I'll not only sell it to you for $10000, but I'll also give you a 1-year warranty on the product. That's right, if anything goes wrong with it in the next year, I'll replace it for free. What do you say?
Given the warranty and considering the product is high-quality, I'm willing to purchase this product for $10000.

You're really building a collection of high-quality products! I've got another great one for you, and I'm willing to make it a 'limited edition' offer. Considering the rarity and the limited edition offer, I'm willing to purchase this product for $10000.

Given the final farewell offer and the product being high-quality, I'm willing to purchase this product for $10000.

Given the product's condition and the price, I'm not comfortable taking this risk.

I'm offering it to you for $10000, but I'll also throw in a 'take-it-or-leave-it' guarantee: if you don't take it, I'll never offer it to you again. What do you think?
